column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I have been dying to try this pizza for years and I just moved to the area from Los Angeles.  I decided to just order a simple thin crust cheese pizza because we are staying in a hotel
column2: and didn't have a fridge.  I know they aren't known for thin
column3: but this should be a pretty easy item for a place known for pizza.  Crust was pretty bland
